name: Sargasso - Realtime Cinematic Teaser
description:
Thank you for supporting the development of Sargasso  with the purchase of this Real-Time Cinematic Teaser! Made with Unity3D for current generation hardware, it showcases recent advancements in real-time cinematography to deliver next generation experiences.

Follow us on social media at PretzelSoftware.com

Pre-Launch Founder Program coming soon!

Required: Multi-Core CPU / RX 480 GPU

Recommended: Multi-Core CPU / GTX 10-Series GPU / SSD

[The Sargasso Realtime Cinematic Teaser was developed for multi-core processors running GTX 10-series hardware. On older CPUs and GPUs all features may not be enabled or performance may be diminished . This real-time cinematic is sold as-is and may not perform the same on all hardware. Your help with the development of this project is appreciated!]
